messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Welcome Tanya
messages.msgSnippet: ... Welcome to the list and welcome to unschooling Tanya. Hopefully the hubbub here will die down soon and the unschooling joy will start to overpower the list
messages.messageBody:
>>I don't know if anyone will care about this...but I am a "newbie" and I do
>>need my hand held...especially in dealing with family.>>

Welcome to the list and welcome to unschooling Tanya. Hopefully the hubbub
here will die down soon and the unschooling joy will start to overpower the
list again. ;-) I, too, like it much better that way.

Life is good.
~Mary
